stepTitle: Determine the domain and the range of each relation, and state whether the relation is a function. Function pairs: $$(-7,11)(-2,5)(-2,1)(0,-1)(1,-2)(3,4)(6,11)$$.
choices: domain : Integers from $$3$$ to $$8$$ range: $$1$$, Is a function
domain : real numbers from $$1$$ to $$15$$, range: $$8$$, Is a function
domain : Integers from of all $$x$$ in the pairs range: [0,3], Is a function
